review: It was buggy, slow to update, and generally a disappointment. Perhaps I was not the target audience as I wanted to send video from my laptop more than a tablet. Video quality was less than I expected- video often didn't fill the screen. Forced to run my browser in a special mode to even get it to partially work. I ended up unplugging it and it's sat unused for months now. Also- you will more than likely need to plug in a power cord to use it- though the cord is never shown in the marketing- it comes in the box.

review: Better than Amazon's for YouTube and anything else you are watching on your phone/tablet and want to watch on your big screen. Multiple decices iOS and Android... If you are on the same wifi you devices will recognize it's there after initial 2 minute setup. No app needed after that point for any device
